author: The Editorial Board
title: A Crackdown on Russian Money
text:
Vladimir Putin is often portrayed in the press as a wily manipulator who always gets his way, but lately the Kremlinâ€™s schemes are backfiring. His meddling in the 2016 U.S. election has created a bipartisan American backlash, and the March attack with a nerve agent in Salisbury, England, is now producing a cross-party British call for a crackdown on Russian money sheltering in London.
On Monday an 11-member committee of the House of Commons issued a report that must have Russian oligarchs worried about where they can safely...
